about_the_game:
Chessarama is a collection of original puzzle and strategy games inspired by Chess. It reimagines chess rules and tactics using many different themes. Each game has its own set of rules, visual theme, and original handcrafted challenges for you to play!

THE CHESSARAMA SUPPORTER PACK INCLUDES:

  • Chessarama Art Book (60+ pages)
  • Extended Soundtrack
  • Exclusive in-game Christmas Chess Set (to be used in Chess Match)
  • 3D-printable (.STL files) Chessarama Chess Sets (5 sets, 30 pieces in total):
    - Christmas Chessarama Set
    - Dragon Slayers Chessarama Set
    - Soccer Chess Chessarama Set
    - Farm Life Chessarama Set
    - Lady Ronin Chessarama Set

You’ll find the files in the “SupporterPack” folder inside the game’s main directory (Right-click on the game in your library > “Manage” > “Browse Local Files”)

*IMPORTANT:
  • You will need access to appropriate equipment and knowledge of 3D printing in order to properly use the .stl files. No support for 3D printing is provided by Minimol Games;
  • The Chessarama Supporter Pack does not contain the base game - Chessarama base game is required to access the Chessarama Supporter Pack.
  • License: all content from the Chessarama Supporter Pack is for personal use only.


Thanks for supporting our studio and this project! We did our best to put together an amazing pack for Chessarama fans, as well as for Chess and 3D-printing enthusiasts. Hope you like it!
